scripts.build-koa-server: rm -fr gen-server/ && concord node --server koa -o gen-server ${npm_package_name}-koa-server@${npm_package_version} src/index.ts
scripts.build-node-client: rm -fr gen-client/ && concord --allow-extra-props node --client fetch -o gen-client ${npm_package_name}-node-client@${npm_package_version} src/index.ts
